message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you the chance to purchase a product that I know will be incredibly valuable to your business. While I can't reveal all the details just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $1,500,000 to you.  I'm willing to offer you a special price of $1,200,000, which represents a significant saving for you.  This is a one-time offer, so act fast!  If you decline, I have another buyer lined up who is willing to pay $800,000. What do you say?
